subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gary Sheffield, Carlos Guillén and Plácido Polanco hit home runs against C. C. Sabathia yesterday, giving the host Detroit Tigers a 12-3 victory against the Cleveland Indians.
snippet: Gary Sheffield, Carlos Guillén and Plácido Polanco hit home runs against C. C. Sabathia yesterday, giving the host Detroit Tigers a 12-3 victory against the Cleveland Indians.
